title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: Pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR creation wizard results in the following error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: Upon pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR creation wizard, the JAR packager reports a failure with the message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
EB: The JAR creation process should handle unsaved editors properly. Users should be able to create a JAR file with unsaved editors. If there are any unsaved changes, there should be a dialog prompting the user to save the changes before proceeding with the JAR creation process.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the JAR creation wizard. 2. Make some changes to the file(s) being packaged without saving them. 3. Proceed with the wizard by entering all the necessary fields. 4. Click on the 'Finish' button. The error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5' should be displayed.
